headline: Bernstein Sees 2026 Favoring Higher-Income Shoppers, Boosts Dollar General (DG) Target
summary: Dollar General Corporation (NYSE:DG) is included among the 13 Best Consumer Staples Dividend Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 5, Bernstein raised its price target on Dollar General Corporation (NYSE:DG) to $150 from $141 and kept an Outperform rating. From a macro standpoint, the firm expects middle- to high-income consumers to be in a […]
